name: Tulum Zip Line Combo Tour
description:
One of the most popular tours in Playa del Carmen just got better!  Now not only can you enjoy the exciting and enlightening Jungle Maya Expedition, but you can enjoy the mystery and dazzling clifftop setting of the Tulum Mayan Ruins site as well.

Tulum is the second most visited Mayan Ruins site in the Riviera Maya, behind only Chichen Itza.  Aside from being the only walled city in the Mayan Empire, Tulum is unique for it's awesome clifftop location, overlooking the azure waters of the Caribbean Sea and the 4th best beach in the world, according to National Geographic.
